segments.source_content:
---
title: Flagsmith .Net SDK
sidebar_label: .Net
description: Manage your Feature Flags and Remote Config in your .Net applications.
slug: /clients/dotnet
---
This SDK can be used for .NET Core, .NET Framework, Mono, Xamarin and Universal Windows Platform applications.

translations.zh-CN: 该SDK可用于.NET Core、.NET Framework、Mono、Xamarin以及通用Windows平台应用程序。

segments.source_content: The source code for the client is available on [Github](https://github.com/flagsmith/flagsmith-dotnet-client).
## Getting Started

The client library is available from NuGet and can be added to your project by many tools. You can find the package here
[https://www.nuget.org/packages/Flagsmith/](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Flagsmith/)

translations.zh-CN:
客户端库可通过NuGet获取，支持多种工具添加到项目中。包地址详见  
[https://www.nuget.org/packages/Flagsmith/](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Flagsmith/)

segments.source_content: ## Basic Usage

The SDK is initialised against a single environment within a project on [https://flagsmith.com](https://flagsmith.com),
for example the Development or Production environment. You can find your environment key in the Environment settings
page.

translations.zh-CN: SDK需针对[https://flagsmith.com](https://flagsmith.com)上项目的单个环境（如开发环境或生产环境）进行初始化。环境密钥可在环境设置页面获取。

segments.source_content: ![API Key](/img/api-key.png)
## Usage
### Retrieving feature flags for your project
Sign Up and create account at [https://flagsmith.com/](https://www.flagsmith.com/)
In your application initialise the Flagsmith client once with your environment API key and API URL.

translations.zh-CN: 在应用程序中，使用您的环境API密钥和API URL初始化Flagsmith客户端。

segments.source_content: You can then use the `instance` static variable on `FlagsmithClient` anywhere within your app.

translations.zh-CN: 此后即可通过`FlagsmithClient`类的静态变量`instance`在应用任意位置调用。

segments.source_content: To check if a feature flag exists and is enabled:

translations.zh-CN: 检查功能开关是否存在并启用：

### Identifying Users
Identifying users allows you to target specific users from the [Flagsmith dashboard](https://www.flagsmith.com/).

translations.zh-CN: 标识用户后，您可通过[Flagsmith控制台](https://www.flagsmith.com/)定向特定用户。

segments.source_content: To check if a feature exists and is enabled for a specific user:

translations.zh-CN: 检查针对特定用户的功能开关状态：

translations.zh-CN: 获取特定用户的远程配置值：
